product_name: CliniqueClarifying Face Lotion Toner 2 - Dry Combination
summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingClarifying Face Lotion 2 for dry-combination skin is Clinique’s bestselling exfoliating lotion. Dermatologist-developed formula sweeps away dulling flakes.
details: DetailsBenefitsSkin Types: Dry CombinationSweeps away pollution, grime, dulling flakes to reveal smoother, clearer-looking skin.For drier skin types, exfoliation whisks away surface flakes, clearing the way for moisturizer.Dermatologist developed and testedAllergy testedFragrance freeClinique Clarifying Lotion is available in 5 skin-typed formulas. Which formula is just right for your skin?Clarifying Lotion 1.0: Extra-gentle, alcohol-free formula is safe for sensitive skin.Clarifying Lotion 2: Gentle for dry combination skin.Clarifying Lotion 3: Great for combination oily skin.Clarifying Lotion 4: Formulated for oily skin.Did you know Clinique’s exfoliating lotion is different from a toner?Toners are primarily used to help rebalance skin after cleansing. Clinique Clarifying Lotion is formulated with exfoliating ingredients to help remove dead cells on skin’s surface. Clearing away that debris with Clarifying Lotion makes skin more receptive to moisturizer and treatment products.Key IngredientsAcetyl glucosamine: Helps balance and smooth skin.BHA (salicylic acid): Helps clear and unclog pores.Research ResultsClinique’s Clarifying Lotion face exfoliator instantly delivers clinically proven benefits* for skin that:Looks more radiant.Looks smoother.With less-noticeable pores.*Clinical testing on 20 women.Item 2153918How To UseUse twice a day, morning and night. Apply with a cotton ball, sweeping gently over face and neck. For external use only. Avoid eye area and lips.IngredientsWater\Aqua\Eau, Alcohol Denat., Glycerin, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Extract, Acetyl Glucosamine, Trehalose, Sodium Hyaluronate, Butylene Glycol, Sodium Bicarbonate, Red 6 (CI 15850), Red 33 (CI 17200), Ext. Violet 2 (CI 60730).Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsShipping Restrictions : This item cannot be shipped via air.This brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Use twice a day, morning and night. Apply with a cotton ball, sweeping gently over face and neck. For external use only. Avoid eye area and lips.

reviews.headline: Love the product
reviews.comments: Very disappointed your store did not carry the pump dispenser.  Have purchased in Temecula previously. Wanted to stay local so tried Escondido again.will be my last visit there. Think products should be consistent in all stores. Gentleman salesman rude

reviews.headline: I love clinque toner
reviews.comments: I use this after cleansing. Not many cleansers remove all your makeup. You would be surprised once you look at the cotton ball after using this wonderful toner.

reviews.headline: A really great product
reviews.comments:
I have been using this product for 40 years. After I wash my face it's the first thing I put on before my moisturizer actually it's step two in the Clinic three step process.
There were other restrictions yes but only once or twice I was forced to use them, and I promptly ran back to Clinique.  The fact that it's been around for so long speaks for itself it's a great product that always delivers.

reviews.headline: Buy again
reviews.comments: Love how this product makes you feel . I use all three steps of this product . Make sure you get right levels for your face .

reviews.headline: Damaged My Skin Barrier Over Time Too Harsh for Daily
reviews.comments: Redness, sensitivity, or new dark spots? I used this toner daily for years, not realizing the alcohol and astringents were damaging my skin barrier. Overuse can cause irritation and pigmentation. Switch to gentle, hydrating formulas instead.

reviews.headline: I would most definitely buy this product again.
reviews.comments: Having been a Clinique user for about 40 years, I can attest to the quality of the products.  I am 72 years old, and when people compliment me on my skin, I simply say there are two reasons why my skin looks so good ... genes and Clinique.

reviews.headline: i would buy this product again.
reviews.comments: I have been using Clinique for about 45 years

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: I use this on a regular bases.

reviews.headline: One of my top products!
reviews.comments: I have been using this product almost 50 years religiously.  Rids your face of all impurities.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: Good price for the amount of product you get. This product is a great face lotion toner.

reviews.headline: Absolute daily must have
reviews.comments: I was introduced to this product - accidentally by a Estée Lauder rep in Ulta about a year or so ago, It has helped make my skin feel so renewed. I generally have combination skin and since adding this to my daily routine twice a day my skin has been so flawless. It looks glowy, younger and my make up looks better. It's a must have for me!

reviews.headline: Great toner!
reviews.comments: I have been using this product for years!  It does its job!

reviews.headline: A must have..
reviews.comments: My skin care regime is not complete without this product.. it makes my aging skin feel so alive and fresh.  I always follow this up with a Clinique moisturizer....I have tried other similar products but always come back to this one.. it will always be a must have for me..

reviews.headline: Best toner
reviews.comments: I pay more but it worth it leave your face feeling the best.

reviews.headline: Definitely would buy again
reviews.comments: Love this.  Multi purpose cosmetic uses

reviews.headline: Love my 3-Step
reviews.comments: I have been using the 3 step system for over 15 years and I absolutely love it! Wouldn't change my routine for anything else!

reviews.headline: For people with access dead and dry skin
reviews.comments:
Im on accutaine and have always had dry skin problems and this was a life saver. 
- never broken me out
- ive only bought 2 big bottles bc they last so long (been using for years)
- I use it after washing my face to get dry skin off so my serums and moisturizer can effectively be absorbed instead of just sitting on dead skin
- you only need to dab on a cotton ball then go around your face 1x
- you can tell its working/you need it when you see yellow dead skin/ pore residue left on the cotton swab if you dont might want to find something else
- had my mom try it and she had no residue on the cotton ball so she doesnt use it

reviews.headline: I use this product consistently.
reviews.comments: Since I like Clinique products, I always purchase the Clarifying Lotion for my skin type.

reviews.headline: Saved my skin
reviews.comments: Ive used this for years and decided to switch to another brand recently. I immediately started breaking out. I started using this again, along with the 100HR moisture surge moisturizer, and my face is comepletly clear. Could not recommend enough.

reviews.headline: I would most definitely buy this product again.
reviews.comments: I have been a recurrent user of Clinique skin care products for nearly 40 years.  I love every product I buy.

media.headline: I will always buy this product
Yes, I have used this product for at least 9 years:)
media.caption: This photo taken Sept 2022

media.headline: It helps to removing the blemishes... I love it..
media.caption: After/before

faceoff_positive.comments: I LOVE the fact that Clinique finally brought back the Exfolation ingredient " Salicylic Acid" in the #2. Clairfying - Taking the product back to what it is meant to do "Exfolation" - So many people forget or don't use the Clairfying thinking it is just a Toner - Get Ready to Turn Back the Clock - After I use the soap - then the Clairfying #2, follow with the Dramatically Different lotion - AM & PM & (2x a week the regular scrub) My skin is translucent as it just was given a drink of water - Everyday People always ask "what I use" I say "Clinique of course" Stay Young - Laugh alot & you too will Always use Clinque - It Works!!!
faceoff_positive.headline: Great Exfoliation

faceoff_negative.comments: I used this for a long time before I realized that using alcohol and witch hazel on the skin is not exactly the best way to go about cleaning or prepping skin. Even though people behind the Clinique counter will always say that this is "cosmetic grade" alcohol, it is still alcohol (and not the fatty alcohols which are moisturizing). For the time I used them, I felt the only way to clear my skin was to be agressive....that really didn't help my problems at all and the proof is in using other products from Clinique like their oil cleanser, which is making my skin thrive. I really think the alcohol and witch hazel needs to go and for the Step 2s to be more of an exfoliating essence type of "lotion". That way it can still exfoliate with the BHA but provide moisture and really prep skin for serums or the moisturizer. I LOVE Clinique's Even Better Essence and I really believe that a formulation more similar to those would take Clinique's 3 step to the next level. Out with alcohol, in with more of a hydrating but exfoliating essence "lotion" please :)
faceoff_negative.headline: The Clarifying lotions need a complete rehaul....
